1527870.name: Property Tycoon Demo
1527870.description: In the demo version of House Flipper City, you will get a fully functional preview of all the major features within the game. Start out in the first of the cities, taking up jobs in other people's flats to build up your budget until you become a home-owner yourself! Buy it, renovate it, furnish it and decorate it so you can rent it out and eventually even sell your new property for a massive profit! It's time to get your brand new real estate business off the ground.
